Outage for Updates to Django 1.0

Created: Nov 09, 2010 03:54 PM
Updated: Nov 09, 2010 03:54 PM

Expect Spooky Pony to be down for a while as I upgrade to Django 1.0. NFA, new comments, file uploads, plus best practices a la James Bennett's Practical Django Projects.
